dark blue.comment: use for base colour on dark mode and text on light mode on both iOS and website pages

cool december.comment: use for base colour on light mode and text on dark mode on both iOS and website pages

gainsboro smoke.comment: secondary colour to be used for larger details

dusk.comment: secondary buttons for both light and dark modes on both iOS and website pages

sky high.comment: teritary colour to be used for smaller details

skyan castle.comment: tertiary colour to be used for smaller details

header text.comment: use for headers on the web page

wordmark text.comment: use for the wordmark on the iOS app and webpage

tab text.comment: to be used for tab titles on web format

app text.comment: to be used for text on the app

button text.comment: to be used for text on buttons on both the iOS app and webpage

copy.comment: to be used for copy on the app

web text.comment: to be used for text on the website format
